name: Quartermaster
descriptions: The quartermaster is a "vendor" found at the U.S. Army field headquarters during the Anchorage Reclamation simulation in the Fallout 3 add-on Operation: Anchorage.

The simulated soldier in charge of weapon stocks at headquarters, the quartermaster is logical and a stickler for correct procedure: Without the right requisition holotape, he won't hand out anything.

There's one exception: Those who went beyond the call of duty in service to their brothers in arms and knows how to speak to him can count on a little bit of extra gear, requisition limits or not. And if anyone asks, "it fell off a truck".
The Quartermaster appears only in a simulation in the Operation: Anchorage add-on for Fallout 3.
detailed_location: Anchorage Reclamation simulationU.S. Army field headquarters

topics.response_text: Help yourself. Anything you need should be in the ammo crates.
Sorry, that's all we're allowed to distribute.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready to change to Close Assault gear.
topics.response_text: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready to change to Fire Team gear.
topics.response_text: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready to change to Heavy Weapons gear.
topics.response_text: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready to change to Sniper gear.
topics.response_text: I'll just take care of all your old gear for you and here are the new ones.

topics.topic_text: The stuff you have is okay, but I need something with more... punch.
topics.response_text: Hell, you earned a lot of respect with the soldiers for what you did to those Chinese artillery guns.
I'm on my way out, sir.{a relieved soldier on his way back to HQ}
Sorry, this is the best I've got. You don't like it, go borrow from the Reds.
